text: 3|78|vēdagranthattile vācakaśailikaḷ vaḷacceāṭikkunna cilaruṁ avaruṭe kūṭṭattiluṇṭ‌. at vēdagranthattil peṭṭatāṇenn niṅṅaḷ dharikkuvān vēṇṭiyāṇat‌. at vēdagranthattiluḷḷatalla. avar paṟayuṁ; at allāhuvinṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷatāṇenn‌. ennāl at allāhuviṅkal ninnuḷḷatalla. avar aṟiññukeāṇṭ allāhuvinṟe pēril kaḷḷaṁ paṟayukayāṇ‌
